attributes.action: Investigation into Apple and Mobile Phone providers repairing iPhones
attributes.additional_details: We would like the goverment to investigate why Apple and mobile phone providers such as EE and O2 are able to tie people into 24 month contracts for iPhones yet if the iPhone breaks after 12 months neither party will repair or replace the handset. This is similar to http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-16339651
